item.description:
Join us for D&D Encounters: The Lost Crown of Neverwinter. Bring your own characters made with Heroes of the Forgotten Kingdoms, Heroes of the Fallen Lands, the Neverwinter Campaign Setting, or any article content in Dragon Magazine that supports these products to make a character. If you don't have a character, pre-generated characters will be provided.

Pull up a chair, earn some Renown points, and kill some monsters!
item.name: Untapped Games: D&D Encounters
